meanings.definition: Aucubas: a type of evergreen shrub with glossy leaves
meanings.sent1: The aucubas in the garden have shiny leaves.
meanings.sent2: I planted some aucubas in my backyard for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The aucubas whispered secrets to the neighboring flowers.
meanings.sent4: The aucubas stood tall like guardians in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The aucubas sparkled in the sunlight, brightening up the yard.

meanings.definition: Aucubas: plural form of aucuba, referring to multiple plants of this species
meanings.sent1: We admired the aucubas lining the pathway.
meanings.sent2: The aucubas added a touch of green to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The aucubas threw a party for the visiting butterflies.
meanings.sent4: The aucubas danced gracefully in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The aucubas created a beautiful green wall along the fence.
